name: Inure Coffee
description:
You're the sole owner and bartender of Inure Coffee. It's just another nice and warm day. Everything is fine, right?  Then what are those noises on your back? Why your heart feels so heavy? Why can't you just leave? Play through all 2 endings. 

VOICES:

FShift: protagonist. 

Jess Andz: doggie, red girl and rats.
